    • Method Detail

      • makeMember

        public void makeMember(java.lang.String name,
                       java.time.LocalDate birthDay,
                       java.lang.String city,
                       java.lang.String email,
                       java.lang.String number,
                       boolean status,
                       java.lang.String disciplin)
        Make a Member.
        Parameters:
        name - Full name
        birthDay - Birthday
        city - City where they reside.
        email - Email
        number - Phone Number.
        status - Status - Are they Active or Passive Members of Delfinen.
        disciplin - Their Disciplin. "" empty String if they are not a competition swimmer. "Crawl", "BackCrawl", "Butterfly", "Breast" if they are a Competition Swimmer.

      • changeMember

        public void changeMember(java.lang.String id,
                         boolean status,
                         java.lang.String discipline)
        Edit a Member. Only able to edit whether or not the Member is Active or Passive, and what Discipline he participates in. Change Discipline to an empty String "" if the person is no longer a Competitive Swimmer on a Team.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the Member.
        status - Status of the Member. Active or Passive.
        discipline - Empty "", Crawl, Butterfly, BackCrawl, Breast.

      • MakeTrainingResult

        public void MakeTrainingResult(java.lang.String id,
                               int distance,
                               double time,
                               java.time.LocalDate date)
        Create training result in the Database.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of whose result this is.
        distance - Distance swam for this result.
        time - Time it took to swim the distance.
        date - Date the result took place.

      • FindTopFiveId

        public java.lang.String[] FindTopFiveId(int distance,
                                        java.lang.String Id)
        Finds top five Swimmers on a Team. For more comments, check method below. It basically does the same thing.
        Parameters:
        distance - The Distance you want to filter by.
        Id - ID of the Member
        Returns:
        Returns Array of the best 5 Members ID for that Distance.

      • FindTopFiveIdComp

        public java.lang.String[] FindTopFiveIdComp(java.lang.String JuniorSeniorPlusDisciplin)
        Finds top five Swimmers on a Team.
        Parameters:
        JuniorSeniorPlusDisciplin - - A very specific String. Has to be like "JuniorButterfly" - Meaning, age first, then swimming style.
        Returns:
        Returns string array

        Parameters:
        id - ID of Member
        list - List of Top Five
        Returns:

      • getNonPaid

        public java.lang.String getNonPaid()
        Get all Members who owes the club money.
        Returns:
        Returns the names of all Members who haven't paid in full. You can't EDIT a member without him having paid in full.

      • getAmount

        public int getAmount(int yearsNotPaid,
                     Member member)
        Little help method to calculate amount owed based on age and membership status.
        Parameters:
        yearsNotPaid - Amount of years the member hasn't paid for.
        member - The member we want to extort.
        Returns:
        Amount of Money owed
